text: Montgomery was a town in Morgan County, Tennessee. The town served as the county seat of Morgan County from 1818 to 1870. It was originally located 13 miles west of Wartburg. In 1832, due to the formation of Fentress County, the town was rebuilt about 1.5 miles west of Wartburg. In 1870, the town property in Montgomery, except the jail, was sold and the county seat was moved to Wartburg. ==References== Category:Morgan County, Tennessee Category:Ghost towns in Tennessee Category:Former populated places in Tennessee Category:Former municipalities in Tennessee
title: Montgomery, Morgan County, Tennessee
